alert.note: Alert for Hendricks; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:22PM EDT until June 25 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HENDRICKS AND EAST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 322 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Danville, or 26 miles southeast of Crawfordsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clayton and Danville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
